mapper.select:
SELECT NO , MEASURE.NAME , DEVICE_ID , SCRIPT_NO , EXEC_TIME , MEASURE.STATUS FROM MEASURE INNER JOIN DEVICE ON MEASURE.DEVICE_ID = DEVICE.ID
AND SCRIPT_NO = #{scriptNo}
AND MEASURE.NAME LIKE '%${name}%'
ORDER BY DEVICE.NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEASURE (NAME, DEVICE_ID, SCRIPT_NO, EXEC_TIME, STATUS) VALUES (#{name}, #{deviceId}, #{scriptNo}, #{execTime}, #{status})
